backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing Pokemon game backend with functions for managing Pokecoin balances, Pokemon collections (with shiny/female tracking), payouts, and match results using Map-based storage per Principal.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining type aliases for Pokemon, Payout, and MatchResult, with a pass-through migration function that preserves existing actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: match-three game mechanics, Pokecoin rewards, shiny Pokemon discovery, payout calculation, and game tab navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components and hooks including game logic, UI components, and backend integration queries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables including Pokemon-themed colors (pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green, pokemon-blue/red).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Pokecoin App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with Internet Identity authentication, four-tab interface (Game, Pokecoins, Shiny Pokemon, Payouts), and themed welcome screen for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, current year, and Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameBoard.tsx: GameBoard component rendering an 8x8 grid of GameTile components with background image, handling tile selection and click events while managing processing state.
frontend/src/components/GamePayoutSummar: Card component displaying payout conversion metrics including total balance, dollar value, progress toward next $1 payout threshold (1000 Pokecoins), and conversion rate information.
frontend/src/components/GameScoreDisplay: Displays game statistics (score, moves, pokecoins earned, combo) in a grid of four styled cards with icons. Calculates total balance by adding earned pokecoins to current balance.
frontend/src/components/GameTile.tsx: Renders individual game tiles with Pokemon names, colors, and shiny indicators. Handles tile selection, matching animations, and disabled states with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component displaying app title with gradient styling and Internet Identity login/logout button. Shows authentication status and handles login state transitions.
frontend/src/components/MatchThreeGame.t: Main match-three game component orchestrating game board, scoring, and backend integration. Handles game end logic, records match results with pokecoins and shiny discoveries, and displays game instructions in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/PayoutManager.ts: Manages Google Play payout tracking with form to log payouts by amount, currency, and date. Displays total earnings aggregated by currency and historical payout list.
Tracks and updates Pokecoin balance with a form input and displays current balance. Shows loading states and provides visual feedback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ShinyDiscoveryNo: Animated notification overlay that appears when a shiny Pokemon is discovered. Auto-dismisses after 2.8 seconds with zoom-in animation and sparkle effects.
frontend/src/components/ShinyFemaleTrack: Manages shiny female Pokemon collection with add/search functionality. Displays collection count and searchable list of logged Pokemon with badge indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameLogic.ts: Implements match-3 game logic with an 8x8 board, tile matching, gravity, shiny Pokemon spawning, combo system, and score tracking for a Pokemon-themed puzzle game.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend API calls including Pokecoin balance, Pokemon logging/searching, payout management, and match result recording with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Pokemon-themed color variables (pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green) and component styles for cards with gradients and hover effects in light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with Pokemon-themed colors (pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green, pokemon-blue/red), custom animations (accordion, shimmer), and OKLCH color system integration.
project_state.json: Project state file defining a Pokemon Go companion app with match-three tile game mechanics, Pokecoin tracking, shiny female Pokemon discovery, and Google Play payout integration. Contains 8 existing features covering balance tracking, Pokemon collection, gameplay mechanics, and themed UI design.
